1583125200.title: The Briefing
1583125200.descr: The Briefing on BBC News will guide you through major events of the globe. Space tremendous achievements, demonstrations, IMF opinion of the risks to the world economy, top stories on election results, airplane crashes, nuclear weapons, vaccination, sport, business and what not. You can join the debate by writing your own thoughts with a #bbcthebriefing.

1583141400.title: HARDtalk
1583141400.descr: HARDtalk is an interview programme on a one-on-one basis where prominent international personalities including presidents and prime ministers of several countries, leading cultural figures, scientists, actors, influencers are being interviewed. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

1583186400.title: BBC World News America
1583186400.descr: Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic.
